summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots and portions of Lots 1 through 5, Block 9, Lawton Heights Addition, now zoned First Residence District; Lots 7 and 8, Block 13, Supplemental Plat of G. Kinnear's Addition; Tax Lots 68, 70 and 107, all in portions of SE 1/4 of SE 1/4 of SE 1/4 of Section 5-25-4; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-339 and 17-266, respectively.
